Html:
hi!

Is there a full documentation for this project?

thanks

No, nothing like full documentation is available.  Have you seen Kirill's 5 minute crash course video? Click on the Home tab.  Better yet, if you have the time watch the screencast he gave at a recent event at http://events.boostweb20.com/Events/SeattleCodeCamp2010/default.aspx#state=sessionCode%242011-6.  It's long but informative.  When you follow that link look for the green play button to get the video started.

David
